audioText: Je te dirai la vérité quand tu seras prêt à l'entendre.
question: When will the speaker tell the truth?
options: When the listener is ready to hear it
When they find the right moment tomorrow
When they have more evidence to support it
When other people are not around to listen
explanation: The speaker says 'Je te dirai la vérité quand tu seras prêt à l'entendre' - I will tell you the truth when you are ready to hear it. 'Dirai' is the future tense of 'dire'.
